website_summaries.verdict: A basic but handsome and durable resin bar set at a great price. It’s the perfect size to fit the majority of outdoor spaces.
pros: Comfortable rounded edges on the bar
Spacious middle shelf in the back of the bar holds up to 45 pounds of drinkware and liquor bottles
cons: Stools could be a bit sturdier

customer_reviews.title: The bar piece is quiete sturdy and the chairs a bit flimpsy
customer_reviews.text: The bar piece is quiete sturdy and the chairs a bit flimpsy. However, the whole piece looks very nice. It was pretty simple to put together. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect outdoor bar! Great for setting up a drink station for indoor/outdoor parties! Easy to set up and seems to be very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, a 1 beer project out back deal! The girlfriend now has a little bar out on back porch for entertaining, and I earned brownie points!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, fast delivery. I bought this for my husbands bday. He loves to grill. So this was perfect with the shelves to hold his grilling necessities and have company seat while he grills.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for the money. Wish the seating on the stools was a little bigger for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Deevah1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the patio
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bar for our back patio and it’s perfect! Lots of storage space and easy to assemble! The top could use a piece of glass to set drinks on it is a little soft.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA LOTTS

customer_reviews.title: Built Right
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my backyard. Looks very nice and strong. Good deal, good price
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Black  .

customer_reviews.title: Great product. it's durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product.it's durable..just make sure everything it tighten. Took awhile to put together need two ppl to help. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranzella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for patio
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a bar on my patio. The shelves are deep for large bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The item is very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The item is very nice for the price. The instructions were pretty vague but with some thought I was able to figure it out. A LOT is screws but everything lined up well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. It arrived yesterday and my husband & I put it together in about an hour. You definitely need 2 people to assemble. The bar stools are sturdy as well as the bar itself. It is relatively light and easy to store after parties are over. I would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: very nice and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and very nice addition to your patio.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey40

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Okay product for the price, excellent for a small gathering around the patio, pool area
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really like it. It took more time to assemble but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Green-Yandell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very shocked at quality and ease of putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for price. It’s good quality and sturdy. Exactly what we needed for our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Nicole Morris

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there's is tension once all screws are in place. Great addition to our backyard
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Pretty set
customer_reviews.text: Set is very pretty. Had no trouble assembling chairs but bar is pretty vague as to assembly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant bar that is cheaper than renting
customer_reviews.text: It took a special torque tool to speed along the build out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crumbles like saw dust
customer_reviews.text: Cheapskate material that breaks way too easily and cost to much
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This bar set is a GAME CHANGER. Everyone loves it, bigger than I expected and it holds up well being outside.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia L Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. The missing piece of my deck!! Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is so beautiful got it yesterday and spent time putting it together it easy the steps were very simple I really like the Quality of this product I rate this product 100 thanks so much when buying on line u take a chance and boy that was worth it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Already falling apart, the stills and bar have no pegs on them to level it out so you have to have an extremely flat surface or you have to build something to put under it- visions already faded it’s cheap sooooo cheap
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Looks Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty good! Box was delivered completely opened and no instructions but we found some Costway’s website. Make sure to evenly tighten each bolt to avoid wobbly chairs! Once assembled the bar and chairs look and feel really good, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mike fusco

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. This wont give much elbow room. It will probably be ok for 2 skinny people. It looks fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet P

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Decent bar. You get what you pay for though. Not top quality furniture. Stools are nice. Cushions get dirty super fast being light colored.
customer_reviews.author: Moni D

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product. Instructions were extremely easy. I'm not handy and had this together in an hour. Quality is excellent. It's visually beautiful. I just want two more stools and have submitted a question to see if it's available so we will see. Regardless I am very happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Postma

customer_reviews.title: Durable Quality
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this set. The quality is good and seems like it will be durable. Some areas were difficult to put together due to the location of the bolts but we got it done. Overall we think this is a great addition to our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Sliding cushions
customer_reviews.text: One stool came in with a bent leg. The cushions only tie at two corners allowing sliding.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES D ROTTCHER

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what you pay, but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived yesterday so shipping was great. Product if fine for what you pay but the 2 stools had damaged legs both were bent. I have contacted the seller so I will update this review when they contact me. Other than that it's a nice lightweight set.
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't suggest buying. Just bought it in April of this year and its already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. This set fits perfect in our backyard. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lober

customer_reviews.title: The seller was excellent in resolving a delivery problem.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Using this by the pool side
customer_reviews.author: debbie p.

product_meta.title: Tangkula 3 Piece Patio Bar Set Rattan Wicker Bar Stools & Table for Lawn Pool Backyard Garden Dining Set with 2 Storage Shelves Indoor Outdoor Moder Wicker Bar Furniture
product_meta.description:
Description
Tangkula 3PCS Rattan Wicker Bar Set Patio Outdoor Table & 2 Stools Furniture presents this beautiful brown wicker bar set with two bar stools. Hosting friends and family for drinks would be the best choice. Square stools are matching with square bar, giving you the most harmonious visual experience. Not only guests will be comfortable but you will be organized with plenty of room for storage beneath the bar. It is the perfect spot for drinks, mixers, ice, and more! Top quality, all-weather resistant synthetic resin is built to last while having a sleek and stylish finish. Our wicker is strong and durable but also lightweight at the same time.

Feature
Strong steel frame and rattan wicker
Including 2 single stools, 1 bar
Useful bar top to put things
The special design of the shelves for storage
All of parts are easy to clean. 
Ideal for patio, porch, poolside or garden

Specification
Rattan Material: PE rattan
Color: Mix Brown
Material:Plastic And Rattan
Size of table: 40.0" x 24"x40.0"(LXWXH)
Size of chair: 15.0"x15.0" x 28.5"(LXWXH)
Weight capacity of chair:250lbs 
Weight capacity of table top:65lbs
Weight capacity of middle shelf: 45lbsPackage 
Include: 1 X Table, 2 X Bar Stools
feature_bullets: 【2 Square Stools】This square design could really elevate the level of the whole set. Square stools are matching with square bar, giving you the most harmonious visual experience. Also, square stools and square bar could allow you put stools on the bar if it is needed to clean or save area.

【2 Ample Shelves】On the back of bar, there are 2 ample shelves helping to storage. What a considerate design! You could put red wine, wine glass, and other serving dishes as you like. Your guests would be easily feeling warm from your elaborate preparation.

【User Friendly】All of part of this set is with comfortable wicker. This is constructed of weather and UV resistant PE wicker, this patio furniture set is great for outdoor use. Likewise, the edge is designed as arc streamline can protect kids when in playing. Please be sure to add this set to your cart, you would not regret for it!

【Multipurpose】The bar set also doubles as a dining set for two to enjoy your freshly grilled dinner on a summer night. Not only could serve indoors, also in outdoors. The all-weather wicker finish is built to withstand the elements so you can get years of enjoyment out of your new set.

【Dimension of Patio Bar Set】Table - 40.0" x 24"x40.0"(LXWXH), chair - 15.0"x15.0" x 28.5"(LXWXH), weight capacity of chair – 250 lbs, weight capacity of table top – 65 lbs, weight capacity of middle shelf – 45 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
